name: Emote Quest 3 Dark Side of the Moon
name_original: Emote Quest 3 Dark Side of the Moon
description:
Created in 72 hours for MoonJam 2021

Special thanks to my teammates who helped tirelessly to make this game possible: MegaCrustle, Toona, and Sprig!

Papaya and her friends reunite after many years to aid Burple Lady in saving God Gamer from mental plagues. Complications ensue that leads the gang to confronting what's messing with God Gamer. Along the way, old friends and new friends show up in the quest to save God Gamer!

There are plenty of spelling mistakes and likely many more glitches and errors, but as this is a silly game made in a short time frame I figure it's a lot of work to correct. Many glitches have been fixed but many more sure exist, if there's anything too glaring let me know and maybe I'll fix it eventually.
